dict.string:
Changelog: 2.3.1 - Chinese (Simplified) Localization - Fixed a bug causing bookmarks to get lost uppon moving items in the bookmark drawer
2.3 - Finnish Localization - Supporting Keyboard Interactive (PAM) Authentication (SSH) - Fixed a bug which caused not all available Rendezvous services to get listed - Removed 'Type ahead' feature of the browser (responsible for frequent crashes)
2.3b2 - Much improved queue management (fewer connections) - Resume downloads (SFTP) - Resume uploads (SFTP) - Resume uploads (FTP) - Move files on remote host by drag and drop - Drag files onto bookmark to quickly upload - Bookmarks are shown in the menu - Menu item 'Download As...' - Editing multiple files in the external editor with the same name - Warning if a duplicate exists when uploading files - 'Apply to all' checkbox in dialog asking for replace/resume/skip existing files - Improved caching of directory listings - When dropping files onto folders it will upload these into the folder - When typing the first letter of a file it gets selected in the browser - Toolbar button to remove all completed items from the queue - Convert line endings when downloading in ASCII mode (FTP) - Auto transfer mode (FTP) - Dock menu item to open new browser - Correctly updating incorrect keychain entries - Preserve modification date when downloading files - Ignoring .DS_Store files - Bug fixes
2.3b1 - External editor support
